data.title: Why BMW's Marketing Strategy Is Going Back to Moviemaking
data.meta_description: Stefan Ponikva, vp and president of brand communication and brand experience, discusses the company's engagement plan.
data.text:
This return is set alongside the release of a short film featuring Uma Thurman, Pom Klementieff and a BMW i7 M70. The film will be screened at the Cannes Film Festival later this month.

Success for BMW Films began in 2001 with an award-winning short film series called The Hire, starring Clive Owen and overseen by filmmaker David Fincherâ€™s production company.

The James Bond-inspired shorts produced eight entries at less than 10 minutes each that were fundamentally excuses to showcase BMWs in car chases.
